resources.string: Present Sir
Hello world!
Settings
This feature is presently available only for IIT Guwahati B.Tech. and B.Des. students. Press OK to continue.
This will auto-add the time table of these courses. All the previous data and time table will be deleted.
The Wednesday class for the course numbered CL 403 has been added from 2pm to 3pm instead of 2pm to 5pm.
The Friday class for the course numbered CH 402 has been added from 2pm to 3pm instead of 2pm to 5pm.

The Wednesday class for the course numbered DD 498 has been added from 9am to 10am instead of 9am to 11am. The Friday class for the course numbered DD 401 has been added from 9am to 10am instead of 9am to 12pm. Update the venue of DD 498 class manually.
For lack of information, the Tuesday class for the course numbered CL 304 has not been added. You may edit the course time table manually.

The Wednesday class for the course numbered DD 301 has been added from 9am to 10am instead of 9am to 12pm. The Thursday class for the course numbered DD 305 has been added from 10am to 11am instead of 10am to 1pm.
The venue for all the classes (except Electrical Machines) has been updated as 1005/3. You may edit it manually.
Only one Wednesday class for the course numbered CL 202 has been added from 3pm to 4pm. You may add the tutorail class manually.

Our code complexity does not allow us to auto-add the course list for B.Des. 2nd year students. We are working hard to develop this feature for you in the next update. You may add your courses manually in the current version.
The venue for all the classes has been updated as 1005/3. You may edit it manually.
Your time table has been updated successfully. All the Bunk Meter are off and bunk counts set to zero by default. Go to My TimeTable to make any changes in the time table.
Your changes have not been saved yet. Are you sure you want to exit?
The course has successfully been added to your time table.
Please set time table of at least one day.
This course will be deleted
Your changes have been saved
Disclaimer: The App does not claim to provide you 75% attendance. Any outcomes resulting from your attendance are solely your responsibility. :P
Present Sir - Feedback/Reporting Bug

You have no PT course in your course list. Press OK to add a PT course.
